releaseNotes.title: Revamped User Interface
releaseNotes.description: Experience a fresh, modern look with the latest Material Design update.

releaseNotes.title: Dynamic Content Loading
releaseNotes.description: Enjoy seamless content updates directly from the server, eliminating the need for manual app updates.

releaseNotes.title: Expanded App Sources
releaseNotes.description: Access a wider range of apps with support for multiple providers, enhancing diversity in app choices.

releaseNotes.title: Enhanced Security Measures
releaseNotes.description: Ensure app safety with Virus Total analysis, providing comprehensive scan results to users.
